comment.author: Logan
comment.text: If any of these Liberal trolls want to help refugees or illegal immigrants, join the peace corp and go help them in their own country!!!

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Donald Trump just landed a big newspaper endorsement!!! ðŸ˜€ The Klu Klux Klan's official newspaper has just endorsed Mr. Trump!! https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.washingtonpost.com/amphtml/news/post-politics/wp/2016/11/01/the-kkks-official-newspaper-has-endorsed-donald-trump-for-president/?client=safari

replies.author: Logan
replies.text: And? No one can control who endorses who!! If your worried more about the KKK than you are about a corrupt politician taking in millions of dollars from middle eastern nations to pay for influence in government policies (pay for play) then you don't have your priorities straight.
